lines.gurmukhi: jYsy piRA sMgm sujsu nwiekw bKwnY suin suin sjnI sgl ibgswq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Pria Sangam Sujasu Naaikaa Bakhaanai , Souni Souni Sajanee Sagal Bigasaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a wife describes her union with her husband to her friends who feel pleased hearing the details;

lines.gurmukhi: ismir ismir piRA pRym rs ibsm huie soBw dyq moin ghy mn muskwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Simari Simari Pria Praym Ras Bisam Hui , Sobhaa Dayt Moni Gahay Man Mousakaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: She fantasizes her union and goes into a state of ecstasy thinking about it. She expresses the beauty of the moment in her silence;

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn ADwn prsUq smY rudn sY gurjn muidq huie qwhI lptwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Adhaan Parasoot Samai Rudan Sai , Gurjan Mudit Hui Taahee Lapataat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: On completion of her pregnancy and at the time of giving birth to the child, she cries in labour pain and her whimper pleases the elderly ladies of the house who express their love for her;

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurmuiK pRym Bgq pRgws jwsu bolq bYrwg moin sbhu suhwq hY ]414]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gurmukhi Praym Bhagat Pragaas Jaasu , Bolat Bairaag Moni Sabahu Suhaat Hai ?414?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, a devoted Guru-conscious slave of the True Guru, whose heart is kindled with love of the Lord by virtue of his loving meditation and contemplation on Lord's name, speaks in a state of renunciation from the world. Although he observes silence mo
